body:
Hi Christian,


For each vertical angle you should have values for all horizontal
angles. So the number of candela values is:
num_of_vertical_angles * num_of_horizontal angles

You can find IES file format specification in document "Thinking
Photometrically" on the site:http://www.helios32.com/resources.htm


I hope this helps you,
Marija
subject: [Radiance-general] luminaire modelling .ies data
